data.generators

Class BasicGaussianDatasetExtender

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.generators.BasicGaussianDatasetExtender

  • public class BasicGaussianDatasetExtender
extends java.lang.Object
    This class finds the mean and standard deviation for each float feature in each class and makes a standardized Gaussian generator which is used to generate synthetic DataInstance objects. In this particular implementation, a separate one-dimensional generator is built for each feature. For more general Gaussian models, one should calculate the covariance matrix.

    • Method Detail

      • generateGaussianModel

        public void generateGaussianModel()
        This method learns a Gaussian model from the data. This model is later used for generating new synthetic DataInstance objects.

      • generateInstanceForClass

        public DataInstance generateInstanceForClass(int classIndex)
        Generates a new instance according to the model.
        Parameters:
        classIndex - Index of the class to generate the instance for.
        Returns:
        A new synthetic instance of the specified class, according to the underlying model.

      • generateSyntheticInstances

                                                           int classIndex)
        Generate an ArrayList of instances of the specified class according to the underlying model.
        Parameters:

        classIndex - Index of the class to generate the instances for.

      • generateSyntheticInstances

        public java.util.ArrayList<DataInstance> generateSyntheticInstances(int numInstances)
        Generates an ArrayList of instances according to the underlying model, while keeping the proportion of class frequencies.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of generated instances.
